name: log-buddy
description: Watches terminal output and explains errors in natural language.

logBuddy.provider.description: LLM provider: 'openai' (OpenAI API), 'gemini' (Google Gemini API), or 'host' (editor's built-in model, e.g. Cursor's model).

logBuddy.openai.apiKey.description: OpenAI API key. Used when provider is 'openai'. Set in Settings (Ctrl+,), not in package.json.

logBuddy.openai.model.description: OpenAI model (e.g. gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4o). Used when provider is 'openai'.

logBuddy.gemini.apiKey.description: Google AI (Gemini) API key from https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey . Used when provider is 'gemini'.

logBuddy.gemini.model.description: Gemini model (e.g. gemini-2.5-flash, gemini-2.5-pro, gemini-2.0-flash). Used when provider is 'gemini'.

logBuddy.useLLM.description: Use an LLM for explanations when possible. When false, use built-in heuristics only.
